entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:56 a.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 6:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.5°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 6.1°C
Wind: E 26 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3
